column4: Hi! I just installed Dapper... looks great! I wanna install RealPlayer now. Is there an easy way of doing this?
hang on while I find what I am looking for
do you want me to put this in paste bin
Thanks for your advice! I'm doing th wget now. I'm not sure what "paste bin" is.
I did that sudo thing and got an error message... "package architecture (i386) does not match system (amd64)"
didn't realize you where using Amd64
I appologize. Is it still possible to install RealPlayer?
I thought that your Amd64 would run 32 bit stuff but may be there is more to this than meets the eye not really sure
take a look at this: http://lwn.net/Articles/113527/
looks like there is a work around
